name: Chickpea Tofu Asparagus Curry
description: Easy Asparagus Curry with Chickpea Tofu, Spinach, Indian Spices and tomato curry. Indian Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe. Serve with Rice or flat-bread. Asparagus Ki Geeli subzi
recipeIngredient: 1.5  cups chopped asparagus (1 to 2 inch pieces)
a generous dash of black pepper or cayenne or both - I always add both
1  cups cubed chickpea flour tofu (or other firm tofu or use cooked chickpeas or beans)
a big handful of baby spinach ( or other baby greens of choice)
1/2 tsp or more salt to taste
1/2 cup or more non dairy milk (cashew milk for creamier)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1/2 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. when hot, add cumin seeds and let them get fragrant or change color considerably. 2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat 1/2 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. when hot, add cumin seeds and let them get fragrant or change color considerably. 2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped asparagus and 1 clove of minced garlic. Cook for 2 minutes or until some edges are golden. Stir occasionally. Transfer the asparagus to a plate.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped asparagus and 1 clove of minced garlic. Cook for 2 minutes or until some edges are golden. Stir occasionally. Transfer the asparagus to a plate.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same skillet, add 1/2 tsp oil, onion, garlic, ginger and a pinch of salt. Cook until translucent. 4 mins. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same skillet, add 1/2 tsp oil, onion, garlic, ginger and a pinch of salt. Cook until translucent. 4 mins. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spices, tomatoes, ketchup and a good splash of water. Cook until the tomatoes are saucy. 5 mins. Stir occasionally and mash the larger pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spices, tomatoes, ketchup and a good splash of water. Cook until the tomatoes are saucy. 5 mins. Stir occasionally and mash the larger pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpea tofu, spinach, and asparagus and mix in. Add the non dairy milk, salt and sugar and mix in. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and heat. Add more non dairy milk or cashew cream if needed and bring to a boil. Garnish with cilantro and red pepper flakes. Serve hot over rice, cooked grains or with flat bread.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chickpea tofu, spinach, and asparagus and mix in. Add the non dairy milk, salt and sugar and mix in. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and heat. Add more non dairy milk or cashew cream if needed and bring to a boil. Garnish with cilantro and red pepper flakes. Serve hot over rice, cooked grains or with flat bread.
